thelatest.title: The Latest (StartUp) - Mobile Application Developer and Developer (05/2016 - 07/2016)
thelatest.description: I worked for two months at StartUp The Latest as a programmer and mobile application developer My main job was to develop an application for the company website The company was close to launching its final product and I was in charge of developing the application for the Android system during my period there. It was a great opportunity to learn about the world of StartUps and experience an American business environment.

aiesec.title: AIESEC - Director of International Exchanges (2014)
aiesec.description: During the year 2014 I was part of the AIESEC global company with the purpose of exercising my leadership, management and teamwork skills. My main job at AIESEC was to coordinate a team of 3 students with the objective to offer international exchanges coming from the organization for students from all schools in the south of Minas Gerais.This work has raised my knowledge related to leadership and people management, besides teaching me key elements in the administration area.

pando.title: PandôApps - Application front / backend programmer (2017-2018)
pando.description: During the period of 04 / 2017-04 / 2018 I worked as a programmer for Front and Backend at the company Pandô Apps.The project I was responsible involves tracking objects of high monetary value.My roles varied between design development, logic and functionality in the frontend.In the backend we worked with Node.JS and Postgresql for the application server and database respectively.This project was an excellent opportunity to experience an ambitious and challenging development environment.It also helped me to develop my skills as a software engineer in general, raising my notions of demand, quality, and manufacturing of software.

getty.title: Getty / IO - Current
getty.description: I currently work as a full software engineer, working with the latest technologies on the market for both backend and frontend. We work with AWS, Node, Mongo, React, React-Native, GraphQL, grpc and technologies derived from the TRON Network (TRX).

myskills.introduction: Through my college years, I acquired certain skills needed to thrive in the engineering landscape.
myskills.proactive: Highly Proactive - Always seeking the solution, not waiting for it.
myskills.team: Teamwork - In a project, a good relationship between team members leads to a better product.
myskills.adapt: Adaptable - Able to adapt and learn quickly and efficiently new technologies and general topics.
myskills.learn: Self-taught - Always evolving and seeking to increase my knowledge in my area of ​​study and adjacent.
myskills.honor: Honor and Honesty - Be honest with yourself and everyone around you to achieve powerful results.
myskills.Resolution: Basic for any aspiring engineer, my problem-solving skills have only increased over the years. Problems are obstacles that need to be addressed quickly, with quality, and efficiently. is the motto of my career as an engineer.
